info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on who is going to receive notifications associated with your Azure API Management deployment.
info.title: ApiManagementClient

get.description: Lists a collection of properties defined within a service instance.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.
parameters.name: serviceName

parameters.description: Number of records to return.
parameters.name: $top

parameters.description: Number of records to skip.
parameters.name: $skip

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: A Collection of the Notification for the specified API Management service instance.

type.description: Resource type for API Management resource.

emails.description: List of Emails subscribed for the notification.

users.description: List of Users subscribed for the notification.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

code.description: Property level error code.

properties.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications about subscription requests for API products requiring approval.
properties.title: Subscription requests (requiring approval)

properties.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications about new API product subscriptions.
properties.title: New subscriptions

properties.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when new applications are submitted to the application gallery.
properties.title: Application gallery requests

properties.description: The following recipients will receive blind carbon copies of all emails sent to developers.
properties.title: BCC

properties.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when a new issue or comment is submitted on the developer portal.
properties.title: New issue or comment

properties.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when developer closes his account
properties.title: Close account message

properties.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when subscription usage gets close to usage quota.
properties.title: Approaching subscription quota limit

get.description: Gets the details of the Notification specified by its identifier.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.
parameters.name: serviceName

parameters.description: Notification Name Identifier.
parameters.name: notificationName

values.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications about subscription requests for API products requiring approval.
The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications about new API product subscriptions.
The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when new applications are submitted to the application gallery.
The following recipients will receive blind carbon copies of all emails sent to developers.
The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when a new issue or comment is submitted on the developer portal.
The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when developer closes his account.
The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications when subscription usage gets close to usage quota.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

200.description: The response body contains the specified Notification.

type.description: Resource type for API Management resource.

emails.description: List of Emails subscribed for the notification.

users.description: List of Users subscribed for the notification.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

code.description: Service-defined error code. This code serves as a sub-status for the HTTP error code specified in the response.

details.description: The list of invalid fields send in request, in case of validation error.

code.description: Property level error code.

properties.description: The following email recipients and users will receive email notifications about subscription requests for API products requiring approval.
properties.title: Subscription requests (requiring approval)
